devProfile.title: Full-Stack Developer
devProfile.headline: Experienced in remote, cross-functional development environments, and maintaining production-grade, scalable codebases
devProfile.summary: Full Stack Developer with 6+ years of experience delivering 20+ scalable SaaS platforms and high-performance web and mobile applications across FinTech, Healthcare, and AI-driven domains. Specialized in building modern front-end systems with React, Next.js, and Vue.js, and back-end services using Node.js, Django, and FastAPI supporting 50K+ users. Hands-on experience integrating LLMs, NLP pipelines, and automation workflows to improve product efficiency. Experienced in remote, cross-functional development environments, mentoring 5+ junior engineers, and maintaining production-grade, scalable codebases.
